attributes.action: ban the employment standard and Enhanced Disclosures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: standard and Enhanced disclosures are makeing it hard for people to get good jobs.. i understand that its for security reasons ..but what if someone wants to change there lifes and want a good life...and want the employer to employ people on what they can do. not what they have done in the past..i think ex offenders have enought on our plates .we now have to worry about getting a good job but cant cause we will not be employed because of the disclosures..due to the rehabilitation of offenders act..how can we  rehabilitate whan we have all thison our shoulders..
